rows.label: ITM_INFO_001_Caption
rows.name:
Gnarlbranch sap can aid the Great Tree's
growth.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_002_Caption
rows.name:
Traditional hunting knowledge passed down
by the Bias since antiquity.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_003_Caption
rows.name:
The simius domesticated by the Cavern Clan
possess a weakness to kepha holly.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_004_Caption
rows.name:
Tatsu has headed for the Forgotten Mining
Frigates in Cauldros.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_005_Caption
rows.name: Tatsu has returned to the BLADE barracks.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_006_Caption
rows.name:
Evidence of Yelv's partner can be found in
Oblivia's East Ibra Ravine.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_007_Caption
rows.name:
Evidence of Yelv's partner can be found near
Oblivia's Lake Basel.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_008_Caption
rows.name:
Neraph's top-secret method for refining a
super-hard type of steel.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_009_Caption
rows.name:
Vandham can be found in BLADE Tower
at night.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_011_Caption
rows.name:
The ideal xenoform representative is an
Orphean who is willing to lend an ear to the
opinions of other races.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_012_Caption
rows.name:
The ideal xenoform representative is an
Orphean who is sharp-witted and logical.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_013_Caption
rows.name:
The ideal xenoform representative is an
Orphean who is selfless and free from
monetary lust.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_018_Caption
rows.name:
So that guy sitting in the lowest strata beneath
Deliverance Park—is that Gerome? What could
he possibly be doing down there?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_021_Caption
rows.name:
Aerozium trade is run by the Dorian Caravan
over in Oblivia.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_022_Caption
rows.name:
A witness to the Ma-non sniping incident saw
the beam shot from Bedrock Hold.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_023_Caption
rows.name:
Thanks to the Ma-non, materials we had
trouble refining are now easier to obtain.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_024_Caption
rows.name:
The Ma-non arms manufacturing firm of
Candid & Credible is lending a helping hand
by making equipment for humans.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_025_Caption
rows.name:
Instructions for making a secret blend of
fiery homemade curry.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_026_Caption
rows.name: A secret recipe for Peking duck.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_027_Caption
rows.name: Directions for a wacky sort of stew.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_028_Caption
rows.name:
The passcode required to enter the Definian
headquarters in Cauldros.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_029_Caption
rows.name:
A recipe for Nopon royal cuisine,
passed down through generations of elders.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_030_Caption
rows.name:
A recipe for a wild Nopon delicacy made of
smushed grass and insects.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_031_Caption
rows.name:
A recipe for Nopon country cooking made by
Warawa's mamapon.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_035_Caption
rows.name:
I heard the victim died after being shot in the
foot and temple! If I were you, I'd avoid
going anywhere alone whenever possible.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_036_Caption
rows.name:
I heard the men who were killed were all shot
in the right thigh and between their eyes.
That's completely insane, right?
It has to be the work of some mad xeno!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_037_Caption
rows.name:
The victims of the serial murderer were all
killed in one of the same two ways. What do
they have in common? And what is the
murderer possibly hoping to achieve?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_042_Caption
rows.name:
The cat that always used to come here for
food has been spotted at Cliffside Beach.
She's probably gonna get eaten by some
monster out there!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_046_Caption
rows.name:
I saw a man with a rifle case hurriedly
descending down into the hangars.
What was going on there?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_047_Caption
rows.name:
I thought I saw a man with a rifle case
rushing into the garage, and a moment
later, a Doll flew out of it! I lost sight of it
near the industrial district.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_048_Caption
rows.name:
An unidentified Doll ran through here at
high speed and broke through the gate.
I chased it for a bit, but it seemed like that
thing was rushing off to Sylvalum.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_050_Caption
rows.name:
I'm gonna teach you how to disarm a bomb.
If you remember this well, you'll be able to
survive having a time bomb strapped to you!
Er, not that you want... Anyway, let's begin.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_051_Caption
rows.name:
Ma-non technology quickly fixed up a broken
Blue Blood, saving a life.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_052_Caption
rows.name:
A human female with an insect-like xeno in
tow. Last seen heading to the east gate.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_053_Caption
rows.name:
The woman dragging the xenoform stole a
vehicle low on fuel and drove off for Oblivia.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_054_Caption
rows.name: Celica went to BLADE Tower to see Vandham.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_055_Caption
rows.name:
Rock was sighted in front of the BLADE
barracks. He seems to be searching for Celica.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_062_Caption
rows.name:
"Our treasure is bane to any wall,
able to harm or heal one and all—193."

rows.label: ITM_INFO_063_Caption
rows.name:
"Our treasure is succor to all of the poor,
a flame that incinerates all evermore—128."

rows.label: ITM_INFO_064_Caption
rows.name:
"Our treasure alone is fit to awaken the way
to a world that is long forsaken—1986."

rows.label: ITM_INFO_065_Caption
rows.name:
A log detailing the activity of Law's Doll.
Everything up until it was wrecked is recorded.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_066_Caption
rows.name:
Did Wanderer Bobora get to Drongo
Caravan safely? Everyone say there lots
of scary things that way.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_067_Caption
rows.name:
Wanderer Bobora has returned to Oblivia.
He was all excited, saying "it surely at
Beehive Rock!" ...Whatever that mean.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_068_Caption
rows.name:
Does friend know if Wanderer Bobora
find what he search for? He said he go back
to Sylvalum one more time, so maybe not.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_069_Caption
rows.name:
Whatever huge thing was, it sound like it was
really, REALLY huge!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_070_Caption
rows.name:
It picked up cargo with wiggly-woobly arms
and legs and then swooped off!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_071_Caption
rows.name:
It has to be slithery snitching snake of rumors!
Also, it breathe fire just like stories say.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_072_Caption
rows.name:
It was giant bird that attacked the courier.
They call it jacul ire. From this angle,
it look like it flew south.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_073_Caption
rows.name:
There's a lake with a special quality to its
water in that cave in Cauldros they call the
Bestial Utopia. Maybe that's the water that
the Orphe have been looking for?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_075_Caption
rows.name:
That Lifepoint Archive that's full of private data
like diaries and photos? Unfortunately that's
just not important enough to justify sending
anyone out to look for it at this point in time.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_076_Caption
rows.name:
I wonder if the Lifepoint Archive unit containing
people's private data is actually unit 13.
You know—the one Ada was looking for?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_077_Caption
rows.name:
If you're looking for Lifepoint Archive unit
number 13, we're confident that it crashed to
the north.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_078_Caption
rows.name:
Rumor has it they've found a new piece of the
White Whale in Oblivia. Haven't recovered it
yet, but let's hope it's something good.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_079_Caption
rows.name:
There seems to be quite the infestation of
blattas in Primordia. Just the thought of them
creeping into New LA makes my oatmeal
want to hit the wall.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_086_Caption
rows.name:
Lan'cord's research data. It contains findings
on Growth weapons as well as information
about the Orphe and humans.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_087_Caption
rows.name:
This data contains a simple memo indicating a
need to investigate northern Oblivia.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_088_Caption
rows.name:
Big, strange turned-to-stone tree exist just south
of here. It full of treasure, right? It has to be!
Nopon should load up nopopotamus and
claim it!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_094_Caption
rows.name:
Dogs sure are cute! Whenever I see Lin 
playing with one here during the day,
it always makes me want one of my own.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_095_Caption
rows.name:
The woman fled toward the diner, but it was
so quick, I couldn't see her face. I have to
stay here, so I'll leave the pursuit to you!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_096_Caption
rows.name:
A female BLADE operative just ran toward the
administrative district. She seemed really
panicked about something, so I hope
everything's all right...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_097_Caption
rows.name:
Are you chasing someone? A woman from the
Arms Union just went down to the lower
level. She looked super calm, though.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_098_Caption
rows.name:
I just saw Ada getting advice from Hope.
It felt so strange to see their usual roles
reversed like that!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_100_Caption
rows.name:
If you break the tail rotor on your copter,
you should always connect any backup system
to the blue wire. You got that? The BLUE wire!
Blue! Like sadness! ...Write that down.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_101_Caption
rows.name:
They've detected multiple heat signals in the
northern part of Primordia's Bedrock Hold.
They think it's likely a petramand nest,
so we need to take precautions.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_102_Caption
rows.name:
I've heard a giant lophid has been sighted in
the sea surrounding the solitary island at the
northern tip of Primordia. I hope this doesn't
interfere with the Landbankers' work there.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_103_Caption
rows.name:
A patrol helicopter crashed near Arendt Bridge
on Talon Rock to the north of New LA.
But it sounds like BLADE doesn't have the
manpower to recover the wreckage.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_104_Caption
rows.name:
The Doll wreckage found on Wonderment
Bluff? Yeah, that's a particularly dangerous
area, even by the standards of Primordia.
Recovery may be impossible.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_105_Caption
rows.name:
I heard they've discovered an alien container
near Bedrock Hold in Primordia. We ought
to claim that as soon as we possibly can.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_106_Caption
rows.name:
They've learned more about that murderous
tyrant in Primordia. Apparently it's a saltat
defending a wide swath of territory centered
on Fallshorn Isle.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_107_Caption
rows.name:
We saw research data that suggests all of the
auravises in this area could be coming from a
single mating pair over at Unicorn Rock.
If we could just find those two...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_108_Caption
rows.name:
Danny discovered a piece of White Whale
wreckage in northern Primordia during his
final mission. We have to make sure his death
wasn't in vain.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_109_Caption
rows.name:
We haven't been able to officially confirm the
location of the tyrant vesper, but we're pretty
sure it has a roost inside Talon Rock.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_110_Caption
rows.name:
Say, you know Fallshorn Isle, right?
Well, that's saltat territory, and they'll attack
if you get anywhere near it. So unless you've
got urgent business there, I'd stay far away.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_111_Caption
rows.name:
Apparently there's still Doll wreckage at the
Plundered Ruin to the northwest. I wonder
if we could salvage any usable parts from
the debris...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_112_Caption
rows.name:
We found some alien wreckage north of
Sayram Lake. I wonder if they were wiped
out by indigens?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_113_Caption
rows.name:
They found wreckage from the White Whale in
the northern side of the Northeast Plain near
Sayram Lake. They want to send BLADEs out
to salvage it, but can't spare the manpower.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_114_Caption
rows.name:
I hear a piece of White Whale wreckage
landed in the northern part of the Silent Mire.
I just hope some dumb indigen hasn't torn it
apart already.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_115_Caption
rows.name:
I felt terrible about having to abandon my
Doll south of Bedrock Hold, but if I hadn't,
there's no way I'd have survived.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_116_Caption
rows.name:
You know those armored suids that have
been trained by the Bias? I bet the best and
strongest ones are kept at the Bias base.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_117_Caption
rows.name:
Have you seen the wrecked vehicle just outside
New LA's east gate? That belonged to a friend
of mine.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_118_Caption
rows.name:
Some debris from the White Whale fell over at
Sayram Lake and hasn't been recovered yet.
Sounds like it's a pretty tough job.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_119_Caption
rows.name:
It seems a xiphias has found its way into
the shoals of Northpointe Cove. That's an
extremely abnormal occurrence, so we suspect
it might be an Overed.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_120_Caption
rows.name:
We found a piece of White Whale wreckage
on the North Janpath Plain. I wonder if it's
been reclaimed yet?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_121_Caption
rows.name:
We found wreckage from an alien civilization
north of Janpath Lake in Primordia. I bet we
could learn so much if we could excavate it!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_122_Caption
rows.name:
*fsssh* A fearsome Marnuck called Daril the
Eradicator is known to appear at a polluted
lake on a small island off of Primordia. So
approach there with care. Especially at night!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_123_Caption
rows.name:
I saw a gigantic cinicula standing atop a
spire in Primordia's Grieving Plains. If that
thing ever found its way into New LA,
we'd all be dead [ST:gender p1=men! p2=men! Er, and women. ]

rows.label: ITM_INFO_124_Caption
rows.name:
We've received word that the boss of those
grex indigens is patrolling near the Beasts'
Lair in Primordia. You'd better hurry up and
tyrant-proof that Doll of yours!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_125_Caption
rows.name:
Another BLADE team got attacked by that
potamus at Primordia's Sayram Lake?
Someone needs to put that thing down!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_126_Caption
rows.name:
They found wreckage from an alien civilization
on Sickle Rock Rise just east of here.
Ooo, I'd just LOVE to dig one of those
puppies up and do a little research...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_127_Caption
rows.name:
At night, I've seen what appears to be an
enemy mech flying around the summit of
Talon Rock. I sure hope that was my mind
playing tricks on me, but...I don't think it was.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_128_Caption
rows.name:
My little brother went to the Silent Mire and
barely escaped alive. He said there's no sun
and it's crawling with adseculas even during
the day. I knew he'd get in over his head!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_129_Caption
rows.name:
A giant balaena has been sighted over the sea
south of La Mancha in Primordia. The Avalanchers
are all in an uproar about it.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_130_Caption
rows.name:
Even when you're right outside New LA,
you gotta stay vigilant. We've had multiple
reports of aggressive blattas appearing
after nightfall.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_131_Caption
rows.name:
So H.B. told me that the king of all duoguills
lives in the pond near Roof Rock! I was like,
whoa! And then I was like, what's a duoguill?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_132_Caption
rows.name:
I saw an Overed millesaur strutting around the
West Janpath Plain like it owned the place.
They're typically a gentle species, but that
one seemed...different.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_133_Caption
rows.name:
So I guess our lost companion was eaten by
a vicious suid on the north shore of Janpath
Lake? That is so so terrible...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_134_Caption
rows.name:
A tyrant has been sighted east of New LA.
It can fly, so we need to be ready for it.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_135_Caption
rows.name:
I found a weird insect mound near the Biahno
River. That place has some scary indigens, so
I don't really want to go back. ...But someone
should probably go check it out.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_136_Caption
rows.name:
Debris from the White Whale has been found
near Headwater Summit. It's weird how we
hadn't explored that area yet, despite it being
so close.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_137_Caption
rows.name:
While on perimeter duty, I sighted a progen
at Headwater Summit. 'Tis a rare sight
to behold around here, but if you wish
to challenge it, proceed with caution!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_138_Caption
rows.name:
You walked back after your Doll was
destroyed by a suid near Shadow Rise?
You are lucky to be alive at all!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_139_Caption
rows.name:
Seems those strange radio waves were
coming from alien debris on Cliffside Beach
in Primordia. We should go check 'em out
when we have some spare time.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_140_Caption
rows.name:
I spotted some debris from the White Whale
in the southern part of the Grieving Plains.
But I didn't have the skills to recover it
myself, so it's probably still there.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_141_Caption
rows.name:
Sometimes, late at night, you can see flashes
of light traveling at high speeds above the
Bias fortress. I've never seen anything move
that fast, so be on your guard around there.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_142_Caption
rows.name:
A piece of White Whale wreckage was seen
just east of Silent Mire. It sure would be nice
if there were some usable parts in the debris...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_143_Caption
rows.name:
You know that small island west of New LA?
A helicopter crashed there, but everyone on
board made it back safely. They were lucky it
happened so close to home.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_144_Caption
rows.name:
I still can't believe that I lost my Doll in that
spore filiavent attack at the Ensanguined Font!
I really should go try to salvage what I can
from the wreckage one of these days...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_145_Caption
rows.name:
If you're heading west, make sure you're well
prepared. Lots of hostile xenos that way, and
the indigens are even worse. Remember that
no alien wreckage is worth your life to find!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_146_Caption
rows.name:
There are also small Growth camps around
the perimeter of Badr Stronghold. If we were
to steal the supplies from those camps, that'd
be quite a poke in the eye for those jerks!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_150_Caption
rows.name:
You know that Larsian guy Zo Langra?
Well, I saw him running panicked through the
commercial district! I'm no psychic, but I know
folks don't run like that unless there's trouble.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_151_Caption
rows.name:
They say there's a gigantic beast called the
Ruler of Fates that lives at the highest point at
the top of Noctilum. I certainly don't plan to
go anywhere NEAR that thing.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_152_Caption
rows.name:
A team that was heading to Noctilum's
Divine Roost said they saw an indigen
lurking inside a gigantic plant. Could it be
one of those tyrants folks talk about?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_153_Caption
rows.name:
Remember broken human whirly-twirly machine
in the Divine Roost? Nopon all freak out
over that one!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_154_Caption
rows.name:
I've heard talk of xenos domesticating simius.
Apparently you can see some at the Ensconced
Citadel in Noctilum. Tame simius!
Can you imagine?!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_155_Caption
rows.name:
The tyrant that attacked so many BLADEs has
apparently been spotted flying just beyond the
Celestial Cleave at the back of Noctilum.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_156_Caption
rows.name:
I heard they spotted a giant scirpo in Noctilum
during a foggy period. You all watch out for
that, okay?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_157_Caption
rows.name:
They say an Overed named Froste, the Courteous
lives in the Vitriol Cesspool. I wonder if the
name is because it's less aggressive than other
tyrants or something...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_158_Caption
rows.name:
You know unafulges? They live in the Celestial
Ascent at Noctilum, and and are dangerous
even when separated from their schools.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_159_Caption
rows.name:
Strong turba named Tormenta the Scarlet-Clad
lives at the Decapotamon in Noctilum.
I will go there and slay it!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_160_Caption
rows.name:
Friend can get treasure from strange tree at
the Middle Hushflood in Noctilum. Now step
up sales, or else lazy helper will
go get it instead!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_161_Caption
rows.name:
I spotted a new Sylooth at the Silent Stream
that seemed to be in some sort of leadership
position. Damn you, Growth! Is there no end
to your military resources?!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_162_Caption
rows.name:
We finally found the trail of the team that
went ahead of us into the depths of Noctilum.
Seems they nearly made it to the heart of the
forest, but all that was left of them was debris.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_163_Caption
rows.name:
I hear a Doll was destroyed by a primordial
creature in the Elephant's Trunk area of
Noctilum. No one was killed, thankfully,
but what a tragic waste of a critical resource.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_164_Caption
rows.name:
Do you possess any information about the
strange tree near Noctilum's Bident Crossing?
For some reason, it makes my Ovah
throb whenever I look upon it.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_165_Caption
rows.name:
We discovered that a part of the White Whale
landed near the Ensconced Citadel. But how
on Earth are we supposed to recover it?!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_166_Caption
rows.name:
I heard they found Doll wreckage in
Noctilum's Middle Hushflood. But it's
probably not the one my brother was
piloting...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_167_Caption
rows.name:
You saw a plant-like indigen aggressively
circling the skies over Noctilum's Everwhelm
Falls? Hmm... I wonder if it was an Overed?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_168_Caption
rows.name:
You had a "memory" of seeing wreckage of
an alien civilization in Noctilum's Qing Long
Glade? Did you actually see it, or just sense it
with that Ovah-whatever thing you do?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_169_Caption
rows.name:
Be careful when traveling along Fukai Pass.
It appears to be insidia territory.
There's one of them in particular that's
unusually tough and tenacious.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_170_Caption
rows.name:
A Doll was shot down at the Decapotamon
and hasn't been recovered yet? That's great
intel! I'm gonna head right over to Noctilum.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_171_Caption
rows.name:
Next time we see forfex near Everwhelm Falls,
smash to death! Then cook! Then eat!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_172_Caption
rows.name:
My friend surveying Noctilum found a
virago nest in the deepest part of
Rockmole's Burrow but was too scared
to get anywhere near the thing.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_173_Caption
rows.name:
A trailer loaded with precious resources was
attacked at Noctilum's Decapotamon.
Just goes to show how dangerous it is to
be out there without a Doll.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_174_Caption
rows.name:
I found an unexplored territory past the
Canopied Nightwood, but before I could
enjoy it, a strong tyrant camouflaged as a
boulder came at me. I beat it outta there!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_175_Caption
rows.name:
A patrol copter sent to Noctilum was lost near
Elephant's Trunk. I hope the crew is safe, but
with all the indigens out there, it's hard to
be optimistic.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_176_Caption
rows.name:
I've heard there's a really ferocious dilus
in the northern part of Rust Lake. If that thing
gets its jaws around you, you're toast!
Er, unless you're in a Doll or something.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_177_Caption
rows.name:
An alien container was found near the
Rustpool Banks in Noctilum.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_178_Caption
rows.name:
There's an Overed in the Rustpool Banks.
I hear it's a scirpo, so it's one of those
spider-type things. I pray I never have to
see it for myself! I simply can't stand bugs.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_179_Caption
rows.name:
I saw this crazy tree that looks like a giant
dragon's tail in Noctilum. I can't get it out
of my head! Could someone please investigate
it for me, maybe?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_201_Caption
rows.name:
I found wrecked Earth-alien Doll north of
Lake Basel in Oblivia. Maybe it contains
treasure?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_202_Caption
rows.name:
Wreckage from the White Whale has been
spotted at the northern part of Lake Basel in
Oblivia? Even the Testamenters wouldn't be
capable of recovering anything from there!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_203_Caption
rows.name:
A tyrant named Edgardo, the Carefree prowls
the North Coast. I doubt he'll be much
of an obstacle if you travel by Doll, but I'd
look out for him all the same.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_204_Caption
rows.name:
I heard some White Whale wreckage fell
beyond North Coast in Oblivia. Course,
I'm just a wrench slinger, so it don't have
nothing to do with me.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_205_Caption
rows.name:
Nighttime is when cetos come out here.
They swallow you whole like grape!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_206_Caption
rows.name:
Indigens nest outside North Coast.
Clever Earth aliens might find something there.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_207_Caption
rows.name:
The wrecked Doll on North Coast? Yeah, that
belonged to me. Took a pounding on my very
first mission out here and barely managed to
escape with my life.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_208_Caption
rows.name:
I heard voice of oracle from fountain!
It spoke of broken oc-serv on North Coast
in Oblivia.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_209_Caption
rows.name:
I recall hearing a report that a human-made
Doll had been shot down near King's Falls.
Shouldn't you recover that? Mmm?
Or am I out of line suggesting so?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_210_Caption
rows.name:
Near Oblivia's Lake Basel, there's a mephite 
that gathers and lives off the leavings of other
indigens. Maybe it's some sort of mutation?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_211_Caption
rows.name:
Human friends abandoned machine in south
part of Lake Basel. Stop leaving trash near
Nopon territory!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_212_Caption
rows.name:
The Nopon at Oblivia's Lake Basel think the
aetrygons that live in the rocky area around
them are divine emissaries that swoop down
from above. ...What a funny bunch of guys.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_213_Caption
rows.name:
The desert around Big Arch in Oblivia is
apparently home to a nest of violent sabulas
who try to swallow intruders whole.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_214_Caption
rows.name:
There's an especially fearless progen that's
making life difficult for the Landbankers working
on the cliffs near Oblivia's King's Falls.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_215_Caption
rows.name:
It would be great to visit floating island in
southern sky. There likely treasure everywhere!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_216_Caption
rows.name:
I've heard you can recover some pretty rare
items out of the indigen dung around Victory
Rock in Oblivia. ...Huh? So WHAT if it's
filthy?! Go do it for all humankind's sake!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_217_Caption
rows.name:
I heard the Testamenters found wreckage from 
the White Whale at the entrance to Oblivia.
They haven't done any actual reclaiming yet,
but hopefully they find something useful.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_218_Caption
rows.name:
There's a large suid sow that naps right in the
middle of the road near here. I don't think you
want to mess with her if you can avoid it, so
don't wake mommy, okay?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_219_Caption
rows.name:
You found a wrecked vehicle at Oblivia's Twin
Arches? Well, it doesn't look like I'll be back
in action any time soon, so you'll have to
handle it.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_220_Caption
rows.name:
Oblivia can be real scary, you know?
I was almost eaten by a giant mortifole that
lives on top of the Twin Arches...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_221_Caption
rows.name:
I discovered some White Whale wreckage
here in the Torhogne Plain, but my skills weren't
sufficient to do a proper analysis.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_222_Caption
rows.name:
That grex lurking in the rocky areas of the
Keegan Ridge is unobtrusive, but I bet
good money it's a hardened veteran.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_223_Caption
rows.name:
I've seen some saltats acting really weird near
King's Falls—like they're making some sort of
offering to the water. It's interesting, but also
a little bit creepy, you know?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_224_Caption
rows.name:
You found a piece of White Whale wreckage
beyond the Keegan Ridge in Oblivia?
Best to leave the recovery of that sort of thing
to the Testamenters.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_225_Caption
rows.name:
The BLADEs that are being deployed to
Oblivia are being picked off by a sphinx
that lurks beneath Victory Rock!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_226_Caption
rows.name:
Merchants from Dorian Caravan say they
discover wreckage from human ship near
Sea Whisper Valley.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_227_Caption
rows.name:
Friends should take Ma-non ship, attack Jair 
Fortress, and steal treasure that is there!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_228_Caption
rows.name:
Gotthard the Intimidating from the Yawning
Giant is dangerous. Even Tree Clan warriors
are no match.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_229_Caption
rows.name:
The vigents that live on the Torhogne Plain
are extremely vicious. Oh, and hungry. So I'd
avoid making eye contact unless you feel like
being torn limb-from-limb.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_230_Caption
rows.name:
If a BLADE finds anything that could be a
usable resource, they have to examine it.
And I mean ANYTHING. Even dung from
some indigen in Oblivia.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_231_Caption
rows.name:
I hear there's an unusual evello near Oblivia's
River Isle that spends all its time mindlessly
foraging for food. ...Like my ex! Ha!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_232_Caption
rows.name:
The Sylooth that strut around the center of
the Ibra Ravine have strange plants growing
from their heads that seem to be highly prized
by the surrounding indigens.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_233_Caption
rows.name:
I saw an adsecula variant at the watering hole
in the eastern part of Oblivia's Ibra Ravine,
but I lost sight of the vermin when it melted
into the cliffs. Blast!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_234_Caption
rows.name:
We saw wrecked Doll on Irian Trail in
Oblivia. Then we left flowers to honor
memory of brave Earth-alien soldier.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_235_Caption
rows.name:
We found wreckage from an alien civilization
at the southern side of the Giant Crack,
but none of us were up for the task of
recovering anything from it.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_236_Caption
rows.name:
I hear a Pathfinder team was wiped out in the
southern Torhogne Plain in Oblivia. I guess
even a Doll is no guarantee of safety.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_237_Caption
rows.name:
I heard that in Oblivia's Ivica Desert,
there are tectinsulas that go for years without
food or water. Pretty stoic, right?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_238_Caption
rows.name:
I've heard rumors of creepy flowers blooming
around Oblivia's Balance Rock base camp.
I don't think anyone's really studied them yet,
though.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_239_Caption
rows.name:
You know that huge broken ring in Oblivia?
I hear BLADE sent out a team to retrieve
a nest of indigens nearby, but the
expedition ended in failure.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_240_Caption
rows.name:
The Larsians told me that they found vehicle
wreckage in the northern part of Oblivia's
South Coast. I should probably thank them for
the tip, right?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_241_Caption
rows.name:
They say the Bias woman who murdered my
friends is hiding out in Oblivia's Mesa Fortress.
Damn her! If I had the strength to do it,
I'd go kill her myself!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_242_Caption
rows.name:
FrontierNET is showing a hit in Oblivia,
but we can't check it out because the target
area is right next to a base of hostile xenos.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_243_Caption
rows.name:
Doll wreckage near Oblivia's Mesa Fortress?
This could be what we've been waiting for.
We gotta go retrieve that wreckage!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_244_Caption
rows.name:
They say a gargantuan millepod lurks at the
bottom of the Giant Crack. The Nopon that
inhabit the area seem to live in constant fear
of it.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_245_Caption
rows.name:
In the searing heat of Oblivia's Barbarich
Desert, wreckage from the White Whale
sits waiting to be recovered. We need
to go find it!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_246_Caption
rows.name:
I hear a gargantuan aprica called Sviatoslav,
the Reproachful appears when rain falls upon
Oblivia's Balance Rock area. How I long
to bathe my sword in its blood!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_247_Caption
rows.name:
We've been ordered to recover the Doll
wreckage that was discovered at South Coast
in Oblivia. I have a feeling it's not going to be
a pleasant assignment.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_248_Caption
rows.name:
A giant duoguill lives at the lake near the
Fallen Unknown Ring in Oblivia. But my observational
hypothesis is that it only comes out during
electromagnetic storms.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_249_Caption
rows.name:
Is that Doll wreckage still in the southern part
of South Coast? If that guy had stuck to doing
business in New LA, he'd probably still be
alive today. Such a shame!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_250_Caption
rows.name:
Apparently a levitath has been spotted at the
Sea Unknown Ring in the sea south of Oblivia.
It seems to be biologically different from the
ones in other places...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_251_Caption
rows.name:
I've spent a lot of time looking at the research
data probes, and I found a strange petrified
tree stump in the north of Sylvalum. I wonder
if I should report it to BLADE?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_252_Caption
rows.name:
I heard a Doll was shot down near Sylvalum's
North Cinderdunes. I sure hope they're able
to recover it...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_253_Caption
rows.name:
To test my radar, which utilizes your
technology, I pointed it at Sylvalum.
Quite happily, I was able to locate a
xenoform relic in the North Cinderdunes.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_254_Caption
rows.name:
I heard they discovered some ridiculously huge
indigen in Sylvalum's West Cinderdunes.
Our new weapon may be just what we need
to stand a chance against that kind of thing.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_255_Caption
rows.name:
Stupid giant Growth warship is hanging
around far northern skies of Sylvalum.
Some nice friend should bring it down
before it bring down sales!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_256_Caption
rows.name:
There's a big petrified tree near the Anvil
Sandplain that's listed as a survey target, but
it's such a dangerous area that we haven't
been able to get close. Feel free to try...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_257_Caption
rows.name:
I was looking at footage of the North Silent
Sandsea earlier when I saw an ovis herd.
And man, their leader seemed like a real
badass! I'd like to see him in real life one day.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_258_Caption
rows.name:
According to FrontierNET's scans, there seems
to be wreckage from an alien civilization in
the northwestern part of this area. But I doubt
my team is equipped to recover it.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_259_Caption
rows.name:
I spotted a petramand near Samuel Incline that
looked like it had been captured by the
Growth. Time to gear up and take it out!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_260_Caption
rows.name:
Did you hear about Anvil Rock Desert? I guess
they found wreckage there of a helicopter that
was sent to Sylvalum right after we landed on
Mira. I can't imagine there were any survivors.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_261_Caption
rows.name:
We lost contact with a guy in Sylvalum's
Silent Sandsea who was piloting a Doll
loaded with treasure. We gotta go reclaim
that loot!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_262_Caption
rows.name:
We discovered a large, odd-looking petrified
tree on the Northern Searoad, but couldn't
get close enough to survey it properly.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_263_Caption
rows.name:
Fellow Nopon in Sylvalum was attacked by
boss monster of Cavernous Abyss. BLADE
friends should take Doll down there and
kill evil thing to death!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_264_Caption
rows.name:
You won't marry me until I've recovered the
alien container that was discovered at Badr
Basin in Sylvalum? SERIOUSLY?
You have the strangest conditions...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_265_Caption
rows.name:
I just paid my first visit to Sylvalum.
We found a container from an alien
civilization at the South Cinderdunes,
but we couldn't open it.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_266_Caption
rows.name:
Watch out for Gesserith the Wileworm.
If she sees you fighting sabulas near the
Samuel Incline base camp, she'll probably
come after you!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_267_Caption
rows.name:
Friend knows big turned-to-stone tree in
South Silent Sandsea? Nopon could make
tons of money selling it to humans!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_268_Caption
rows.name:
So so I saw an alien container near the
Delusian Mountains. But I figured it was
probably full of junk and stuff, so I just...
left it alone?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_269_Caption
rows.name:
I discovered an alien container in North
Hardheart Canyon. If we could recover it
and analyze its contents, I bet it could be
of some use to humanity.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_270_Caption
rows.name:
There's a large pack of indigens in the vicinity
of the Shivering Sands. We suspect the
monoceros that leads them is an Overed.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_271_Caption
rows.name:
So I heard there's a strange petrified tree in
the South Cinderdunes in Sylvalum?
This sounds like a job for the universe's
greatest treasure hunter! ...Which is, er, me?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_272_Caption
rows.name:
You know that alien wreckage in the southern
part of the Silent Sandsea? Well, it seems
those sluggards in the lower base camp still
haven't gotten around to salvaging it.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_273_Caption
rows.name:
We discovered an alien container in the dunes
to the west of Lake Ciel in Sylvalum. Perhaps
the humans can make better sense of it than
we Larsians could?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_274_Caption
rows.name:
There's a reliquary from an alien civilization at
the South Ciel Sandsea, but it doesn't look
like it has anything to do with the Growth.
What sort of beings used to live there?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_275_Caption
rows.name:
Did you hear about the ferocious indigen that
patrols the skies above the northwest part of
Lake Ciel in Sylvalum? Let's hope the humans
bring it down fast, right?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_276_Caption
rows.name:
I hear the aggressive aetrygon in Sylvalum are
driving people away from Xanadu Overlook.
You know, there ain't nothing you can't send
flying with a weapon from Grenada GG!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_277_Caption
rows.name:
Friendpon see arenatect in northeast
Lake Ciel. It suddenly start moving and
scare wits from poor friendpon!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_278_Caption
rows.name:
Nopon friend saw Growth machine in
Hardheart Canyon that look different from
usual Growth machine. Hopefully they not
come this way...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_279_Caption
rows.name:
You found an alien container in Sylvalum? In
the southern Delusian Mountain foothills?
Forget that and dance! No duty now!
There is only THE DAAAAAANCE!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_280_Caption
rows.name:
I saw something I'd never seen before rolling
around the Sylvalum Searoad. I think it was
some sort of mechanical lifeform? Anyway,
I don't know, so I'd stay far, far away.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_281_Caption
rows.name:
I hear a massive indigen that no one's ever
seen before lives in the western part of
Sylvalum's Lake Ciel. I wonder if our weapons
would even be effective against such a thing?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_282_Caption
rows.name:
Apparently, an artifact from an alien culture has
been discovered at Lake Ciel in Sylvalum.
It's a pretty enormous lake, so I guess it's
no wonder we hadn't found it before...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_283_Caption
rows.name:
The massive indigens east of Lake Ciel seem
to grow violent when crimson auroras occur.
It's important to pay attention to how the
weather affects such primordial creatures.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_284_Caption
rows.name:
Really? You came all the way back from
Sylvalum to look for a fighter who might
recover the alien reliquary east of Lake Ciel?
Er, well, good luck with that...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_285_Caption
rows.name:
Did you know there's a whole 'nother continent
north of New LA? They say there's these giant
petrified-tree things all over the place there,
and that they sometimes have stuff inside...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_286_Caption
rows.name:
Friendpon saw nice big turned-to-stone tree
southwest of Lake Ciel, but had too much
cargo to haul it away. Maybe next time.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_287_Caption
rows.name:
Have you seen the helicopter wreckage in the
Needle Rock Sandsea? It was shot down by
the Hilal Stronghold. One of these days, we're
going to have to go and recover what's left.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_288_Caption
rows.name:
Be careful when searching beneath the
noctilucent spheres in Sylvalum, okay?
That's where vivohasts like to hide in hopes
of trapping prey.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_289_Caption
rows.name:
Have you seen that giant indigen at Sylvalum's
Hilal Meadow? We keep our eyes peeled for
that thing every time we pass through there.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_290_Caption
rows.name:
It seems a really unusual petrified tree was
found in the southeast part of Sylvalum.
Any chance you're going back to take a
closer look?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_291_Caption
rows.name:
On the Seabird's Beak of Sylvalum, I saw a
visigel that was significantly stronger than
all of the others. If I'd gotten any closer,
I probably wouldn't be alive to tell the tale!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_292_Caption
rows.name:
We've already lost 21 BLADEs to the giant
tyrant of Hilal Meadow. I can barely
comprehend how dangerous that thing must
be. It makes my knees tremble!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_293_Caption
rows.name:
We found something near Hilal Meadow
in Sylvalum. It may be alien artifact.
But Growth fortress is very close,
so there is much risk to claiming it.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_294_Caption
rows.name:
Friendpon found ruins of Growth Doll at
East Ciel Sandsea. As he laugh at
misfortune, Marnuck emerge from inside!
So awkward...er, for friendpon...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_295_Caption
rows.name:
Did you see that big petrified tree nearby?
I'd love to survey that, but it's beyond my
physical capabilities. I'll just have to ask the
Testamenters to do it. *sigh*

rows.label: ITM_INFO_296_Caption
rows.name:
I was watching some footage earlier and
noticed some of the Growth mechs deployed
along the outer walls of Sylvalum were
destroyed. Seriously!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_297_Caption
rows.name:
I wrecked my Doll near Hilal Stronghold. Let
myself get distracted for just an instant, but
that's all the time it took. She was the best
partner I ever had... *sniff*

rows.label: ITM_INFO_298_Caption
rows.name:
I hear of Sylvalum cave where Marnuck hid
great treasure by south wall...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_299_Caption
rows.name:
Someone said they saw an eerie, shimmering
creature at the entrance to Sylvalum, but that
it disappeared right in front of them. You
know what that means? GHOSTS! EEEEK!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_300_Caption
rows.name:
I hear there's a cervus with golden horns in
the South Ciel Sandsea of Sylvalum. I can't
even IMAGINE trying to take down that thing!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_301_Caption
rows.name:
My BLADE friend said he chanced upon a
Milsaadi that controls insects at the Forgotten
Mining Frigates in Cauldros. He also said that
she appears at night and is one tough cookie!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_302_Caption
rows.name:
We spotted wreckage from the White Whale
west of G'nahan Villa. I can't believe how far
afield that piece fell—the ship must have
completely disintegrated in midair.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_303_Caption
rows.name:
I heard they found debris from the White 
Whale on the cliffs of a small island in the
western part of Cauldros, but that recovering
it has proven too difficult.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_304_Caption
rows.name:
That reminds me... There was a giant
petramand that lived atop the magma waterfall
in Cauldros. It would have been quite the
menace had it existed on our planet.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_305_Caption
rows.name:
We found wreckage from an alien civilization
west of Mount M'gando in Cauldros.
With the reward I get for excavating it,
I'm gonna buy you something really special!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_306_Caption
rows.name:
They say there's a giant bird indigen at
Mount M'gando in Cauldros. When I imagine
myself having to fight that thing... Nope.
Nope nope nope nope nope.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_307_Caption
rows.name:
I got a message from my sister saying there's
a valuable-looking alien reliquary in the
magma fields of Cauldros. Ooo, so exciting!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_308_Caption
rows.name:
The entrance to Cauldros's O'rrh Sim Castle
is guarded by a cutting-edge model of Galdr
that shimmers like gold. There's no way I'd
even make it through the front door.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_309_Caption
rows.name:
Most of Cauldros seems to be under the
Growth's control. But if we could sneak into
their headquarters and steal their supplies...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_310_Caption
rows.name:
During the day, you can see a really fast
Seidr near the Growth hangar. The guy
behind the controls must be one of their ace
pilots.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_311_Caption
rows.name:
There's a hidden treasure in an indigen's nest
in Cauldros's O'rrh Sim castle ruins, right?
Should I get it for the Bias lady who sits
here at night to try and make her feel better?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_312_Caption
rows.name:
I journeyed to Mount M'gando in Cauldros,
but was beset from above by a ferocious ictus.
I nearly became a kebab myself!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_313_Caption
rows.name:
Some alien wreckage was spotted near
Cauldros's M'gando Gorge.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_314_Caption
rows.name:
They say there's treasure hidden in an indigen
nest in the northeast part of Cauldros. But I
doubt I could get close enough to find out,
even with my awesome Doll.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_315_Caption
rows.name:
Did you know about the alien reliquary that
was found west of the Scholes Battlegrounds?
It requires a pretty high level of skill to be
properly investigated, if you're up for it.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_316_Caption
rows.name:
If you head up this hill, you'll end up in a
meadow known as the Emerian Battlegrounds.
It's even safer over there than it is here,
so feel free to check it out.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_317_Caption
rows.name:
There are remains of a Doll from an alien
civilization on the Emerian Battlegrounds.
I guess even they had their hands full
protecting themselves from the local indigens.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_318_Caption
rows.name:
If either of you truly love me, you'll go to
Cauldros and recover the patrol copter that
crashed in the lava fields!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_319_Caption
rows.name:
The xeno who uses a pack of caro to guard
O'rrh Sim Castle is the one who killed my
boyfriend! Xenoforms are our enemy!
So get the hell out of here already!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_320_Caption
rows.name:
Yes, we've detected a badly-damaged alien
container in Cauldros's north T'phnom Shelf.
Do you think you will be able to retrieve
anything out of it?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_321_Caption
rows.name:
A helicopter crashed near the T'phnom Shelf.
The pilot was maneuvering carefully, but was
suddenly shot down from out of nowhere.
It was our first fatality after arriving on Mira.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_322_Caption
rows.name:
Have you heard about that Milsaadi named
Sharnaak the Technician? He appears at night
on Mount M'gando in Cauldros, then lays
waste to all with these horrible weapons!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_323_Caption
rows.name:
The Scholes Battlegrounds are home to a
caro who is an exceptional hunter. It lunges
from the shadows of rocks like a loosed arrow
from the bow.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_324_Caption
rows.name:
A buddy of mine who went to Cauldros saw
an electromagnetic storm by the Forgotten
Mining Frigates. He said there was a super-
strong scintimure there veiled in lightning!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_325_Caption
rows.name:
They say there's an alien reliquary in the Old
Ceremonial Hollow in Cauldros, you know?
Maybe if I had whatever relic lies within there
I could finally finally beat this guy...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_326_Caption
rows.name:
I saw an elderly Gularth in front of Sunset
Falls, just staring intently at the tumbling
magma. Maybe it likes the solitude?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_327_Caption
rows.name:
Some Arms said they found an indigen
nest at a place called the Ancient Warscape?
Scary. Cauldros is so so so scary.
It's basically unexplorable, isn't it?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_328_Caption
rows.name:
Apparently Nopon friend saw White Whale
wreckage at Wildcat Fortress in Cauldros.
Wonder if it full of treasure?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_329_Caption
rows.name:
Friend see that weird statue south of Forgotten
Mining Frigates? It was broken even before
Nopon get here, so stop blaming!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_330_Caption
rows.name:
Strange caecus is attacking friends that go
to Dragonbone Promontory in Cauldros.
Maybe it think cape is home?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_331_Caption
rows.name:
One of friends' whirly-twirly machines
crashed near Sunset Falls.
It not smart to fly around here!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_332_Caption
rows.name:
The Growth seem to have some sort of un-
manned weapons they call "xe-dom" on their
mining ships in Cauldros. Perhaps you could
use your human power to...smash them?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_333_Caption
rows.name:
They say that at nights in Cauldros, a giant
blatta emerges near the Forgotten Mining
Frigates. Crazy, right?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_334_Caption
rows.name:
This top-secret information! There is Growth
supply crate over at Ternion Fork.
Friend should sneak back later to steal it!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_335_Caption
rows.name:
Wait. They've detected a Lifepod on Cauldros's
Slavebird Isle? Say whaaaaaat? How in the
heck did it ever end up in a place like that?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_336_Caption
rows.name:
You're saying one of our patrol copters was
shot down near the palace in the southeast
of Cauldros? Damn! I can't imagine a worse
place for a chopper to go down.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_337_Caption
rows.name:
I heard they found a Lifepod in the southern
part of Cauldros. If I could recover that,
I'd get a huge reward! Huge, I tell you!
Probably enough to buy a car!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_338_Caption
rows.name:
I left some supplies near the probe placement
site in segment 314 on the FrontierNET maps.
If you ever run into trouble, feel free to use
them.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_339_Caption
rows.name:
We were quick to rebuild after the invasion,
but wreckage from the battle remains. It seems
no one has bothered to clean up the debris
that crashed on the top of this crane yet.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_340_Caption
rows.name:
Have you noticed the strange structure floating
in the northeast of FN site 501 on the segment
map? Readings suggest there's treasure inside,
but how are we supposed to retrieve it?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_341_Caption
rows.name:
I saw a weird headless statue at the Bestial
Utopia. I wonder how old it is? We should
take it back to NLA for analysis.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_342_Caption
rows.name:
We discovered a Lifepod south of Sunset Falls.
We tried to recover it, but the indigens gave
us so much trouble that we had to give up.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_352_Caption
rows.name:
Secretary Nagi is coming to inspect the
Arms test hangar! It'll be early,
but I expect you to be bright eyed
and bushy tailed, you hear?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_353_Caption
rows.name:
Larsians are hold fighting tournament at
Arms test hangar. Do you think you are
warrior? Go prove it!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_354_Caption
rows.name:
A Larsian warrior is searching for able-
bodied BLADEs? In the interest of establishing
friendly relations, we should dispatch BLADEs
to their refuge immediately.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_355_Caption
rows.name:
This guy Hugo in the industrial district got all
excited about how he'd made some earth-
shattering discovery, but when he tried to
explain it? Whoosh! Right over my head.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_356_Caption
rows.name:
In the industrial district, I spied the xenoform
Celica massaging the head of a small,
long-eared animal. Could that have been a
form of religious worship as well?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_357_Caption
rows.name:
I saw a new type of xenoform in front of
BLADE Tower. He said he was a Larsian,
I think? Then he mumbled something about
this place being useless for training.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_358_Caption
rows.name:
So what was the deal with that Yardley guy
at the Arms test hangar? Did he really
think we'd give him our precious resources
for his nonsensical research project?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_359_Caption
rows.name:
There's a rumor going around that a giant
ape has been climbing the tower of the
Arms test hangar at night! And that he's
holding a damsel in his oversized hand!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_360_Caption
rows.name:
I saw that Larsian, Gi Zang, near the
maintenance center. He said he was preparing
for some sort of warrior's training pilgrimage,
so I just got out of his way.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_361_Caption
rows.name:
This morning I saw this big, buff BLADE guy
giving a fellow mechanic detailed instructions
about something. He really seemed like he
knew what he was talking about.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_362_Caption
rows.name:
Just before dawn, I stumbled into some secret
meeting in the industrial district, and a woman
there pointed a gun at me! For reals!
I almost got shot!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_363_Caption
rows.name:
Hey, you! Liza seems to be having trouble
dealing with all the garbage over at the plant.
Go help her with that! Go on! Move it!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_364_Caption
rows.name:
My friend at the Arms test hangar is
furious. I guess she has to go give Irina
another talking-to.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_365_Caption
rows.name:
That Lin girl has been wrestling with a flight
module at the Arms test hangar until the
wee hours of the night. She truly is a diligent
researcher, that one.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_366_Caption
rows.name:
Dr. Hugo is developing a new battle data
probe in the Arms test hangar? Intriguing.
Shall we go check it out?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_367_Caption
rows.name:
Saw Elma on a lunch break recently. She was
talking to a mechanic, and seemed worked
up about something. I was gonna ask her for
an autograph, but it looked like a bad time.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_368_Caption
rows.name:
I saw Robert in the industrial district.
Poor guy looked really upset about something.
I wonder what happened?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_369_Caption
rows.name:
That Tobias will do anything to make a buck!
He's engaged in all sorts of dirty business
down in the industrial district, I hear. Someone
needs to give him a taste of God's wrath.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_370_Caption
rows.name:
I was thinking about the Zaruboggan baby
that was born in the industrial district.
Can you imagine being born in a crazy place
like this? Poor poor baby...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_371_Caption
rows.name:
There seems to be this weird container that's
been dumped at the integrated production
plant. What could possibly be inside it?
Nothing good, I'll warrant!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_372_Caption
rows.name:
You know that guy Hugo? He's going around
the industrial district bugging every BLADE he
sees to help him with some new invention.
But no one wants to, and I don't blame 'em!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_373_Caption
rows.name:
I saw a stuffed animal lying on the ground in
the industrial district outside the Arms test
hangar. There was something kind of...creepy
about it, so I just kept walking.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_374_Caption
rows.name:
You know a guy from the industrial district
named Horonalderon? Apparently he was
attacked by the Growth outside the city,
but some weird squad came to his rescue.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_375_Caption
rows.name:
Now Hope's helping out in the industrial
district! Is that woman just gonna work
herself until she collapses?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_376_Caption
rows.name:
I just saw a Zaruboggan in the industrial
district with smoke billowing out of his
backpack. Is that...supposed to happen?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_377_Caption
rows.name:
Irina's really nice. She's busy as all heck
but still takes time out of her schedule to give
advice to fellow BLADEs almost every night!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_378_Caption
rows.name:
Every now and then, Frye abstains from
drinking for a night. Then he goes to the top
of the bridge and looks out on New LA.
What's up with that?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_379_Caption
rows.name:
I saw Lara Nara flirting with his boyfriend at
the terrace in front of BLADE Tower.
He was saying he had some good news...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_380_Caption
rows.name:
I saw a massive xenoform doing hard labor
in the industrial district. There was a cute girl
right beside him, but I still couldn't peel my
eyes away from him.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_381_Caption
rows.name:
Hey, um... Listen, I just saw a xeno that I've
never seen before in the industrial district.
I'm not sure that it's supposed to be there...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_382_Caption
rows.name:
A female BLADE just went into the back alley
with two scary-looking dudes. You think she's
okay? She didn't look all that tough, and it's
pretty dark back there...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_383_Caption
rows.name:
There's a Zaruboggan around here who keeps
searching for...something. I hope it's not
anything weird or dangerous.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_384_Caption
rows.name:
I heard Frye's been spotted in the hangars at
night engaging in some kind of real serious
conversation. Frankly, I'm shocked he stayed
sober long enough to converse with anyone!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_385_Caption
rows.name:
BLADE has placed equipment caches in 
each district of the city. Let's hope the day
never arrives when they need to use them.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_386_Caption
rows.name:
Gwin's always following Irina around.
He even waits on the bridge in the afternoons
while she's going shopping! That's...pathetic.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_387_Caption
rows.name:
I swear I'm telling the truth—Irina was
actually humming to herself as she was
shopping in the commercial district!
What is going on with her?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_388_Caption
rows.name:
So I saw Phog in the commercial district's
Barista Court earlier. He was just...staring into
a café of some kind. That's weird, right?
Isn't that weird?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_389_Caption
rows.name:
What? There's a ghost of a Nopon that
appears at the top of BLADE Tower?
Sh-shut up! I don't even believe in ghosts!
Stop trying to scare me with your voodoo!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_390_Caption
rows.name:
I was in commercial district this morning.
Saw small girl with huge giant. Is this Celica?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_391_Caption
rows.name:
Civilians can't open those BLADE supply boxes
placed in every district of the city, right?
So what are we supposed to do if something
happens? Just run for our damn lives?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_392_Caption
rows.name:
You know Tracey? The Companion? I just saw
her arrest a Zaruboggan down at Barista
Court in the commercial district! I hope this
doesn't turn into some diplomatic disaster...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_393_Caption
rows.name:
There's a Zaruboggan named Shiraton
standing in front of Rosemoss in the
commercial district. That can't be good for
business.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_394_Caption
rows.name:
Lately, Miia always seems to have something
she needs to do late at night. Maybe she's
working in the commercial district again?
Man, she shouldn't be overdoing it like that.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_395_Caption
rows.name:
There's still wreckage from Growth Dolls
in the commercial district, but we've been told
not to move it until the investigation is over.
Come on, already! I'm tired of lookin' at it!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_396_Caption
rows.name:
I just saw a man getting into a tangle with a
bunch of dangerous thugs across the way.
I wonder if he's okay. Not like there's
anything we can do about it, but still...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_397_Caption
rows.name:
I went to the Sunshine Café for an espresso,
but they couldn't make me one! I guess the
machine's broken or something? Anyway,
it pretty much ruined my whole day.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_398_Caption
rows.name:
Around noon, I saw Doug rubbing his cheek
against some dog at the Ishmael Hills steps.
...He seemed tired. Must be working too hard.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_399_Caption
rows.name:
Lin's down in the administrative district,
holding court with all the ladies from the
Landbankers. I see it's not only the lads who
that girl's popular with.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_400_Caption
rows.name:
A weird Ma-non by the name of Chiopitus is
walking in Barista Court in the commercial
district. I guess he wants humans to help with
an experiment, which, yeah. No thanks.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_401_Caption
rows.name:
It looks like Veverta dropped her comm device,
doesn't it? She seems to be wandering the
commercial district saying bad things under
her breath. Bad bad things...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_402_Caption
rows.name:
Oh my gosh! Victoria from Belle Betty
Fashions is recruiting designers at Barista
Court! I'm going to be so fashionable before
this is all over, you won't even believe it.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_403_Caption
rows.name:
Sometimes I see L out here in the middle of
the night with a big smirk on his face.
I always figure he's getting his kicks by selling
strange new inventions again.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_404_Caption
rows.name:
I saw Secretary Nagi at the intersection on
North Founders Street at eight o'clock this
morning! Eight! In the MORNING! So you
totally HAVE to believe me now, right?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_405_Caption
rows.name:
...Hmm? An elder at the Nopon Bazaar is so
sick he's about to collapse? That's horrible!
If there's anything we can do to help,
don't hesitate to ask.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_406_Caption
rows.name:
A Nopon named Chiroro seems to be
sending out distress calls from the Floating
Reef over in Oblivia.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_407_Caption
rows.name:
When I went shopping at the boutique earlier,
Alesa and a Ma-non named Wersal were
really going at it. What would those two
possibly have to argue about?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_408_Caption
rows.name:
Kirsty's in a mood about something—she's
been barking orders at BLADEs near the
barracks all day. Must be nice to be so pretty
that you even look good when you're mad.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_409_Caption
rows.name:
When fighting erupts in the commercial district
alleyways at night, the Murderess is always
watching from the crowd. Some new scheme
of hers, I bet. Or maybe she just likes blood.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_410_Caption
rows.name:
I met a human named Frye on Melville Street
who isn't above raising a glass with
Larsians. I hope we can learn to be so
cordial in our own dealings.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_411_Caption
rows.name:
So in the commercial district, I guess a Nopon
named Bubu is worried about his wife going
missing? That is so so sad...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_412_Caption
rows.name:
I hear the wreckage of the Growth mechs
still hasn't been fully removed from the
commercial district? I guess no one wants to
to to clean after surviving a huge battle.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_413_Caption
rows.name:
Drill Sergeant Wolf wants to recruit xenoform
BLADEs to join the fight against the Growth.
As if any xeno could survive his training
regimen! Ha!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_414_Caption
rows.name:
A Nopon named Warawa is searching
Armory Alley for the super-rare gold
nopopotamus Miralife Card. Hooo boy!
That will NOT be easy to find...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_415_Caption
rows.name:
When I went to lunch earlier, I saw a Ma-non
arguing with some kind of xeno I've not seen
before, near the restaurant. I hope that doesn't
become...a thing? The arguing, I mean...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_416_Caption
rows.name:
I think the Companion named Beats who patrols
the commercial district is is is searching for
electronic books while he works?
That's human diligence for you...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_417_Caption
rows.name:
I saw Ackwar interviewing witnesses on
Melville Street. Did something happen there?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_418_Caption
rows.name:
At night, I often see Hope waiting for
someone outside of a building in the
commercial district. Helping out yet
another poor soul in need, most likely.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_419_Caption
rows.name:
On the Ma-non ship's deck, the Orphe were
running around Sun'barac in panicked circles.
*fsssh* They're a weak race like us, which
means there's always a reason to worry.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_420_Caption
rows.name:
I saw Elma watching passing cars in the
commercial district. Could she be protecting
someone? Or maybe looking for criminals?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_421_Caption
rows.name:
A Bias named Loda Gorida was raising a
huge fuss on the Ma-non ship, saying his
daughter was abducted by a human.
Could that really be true? Come on!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_422_Caption
rows.name:
When I went to the Ma-non ship, there was
a buglike xeno called Nan'celeg that was
constantly mumbling to itself. I am going to
have nightmares about that for WEEKS.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_423_Caption
rows.name:
A Zaruboggan, I think? It was acting like it
wanted to say something to me but gave up
and went back to the Ma-non ship. 
Maybe it was looking for something?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_424_Caption
rows.name:
Bazis Wolfen is about to have a baby!
...I wonder what Bias babies look like.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_425_Caption
rows.name:
Sounds like the Bias are gearing up for a
wedding! Aw, that's great. We all could use
some happy news in these trying times.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_426_Caption
rows.name:
I hear there's this Larsian on the Ma-non
ship who was saying something about
an apprentice gathering steel for him?
I couldn't really make heads or tails of it.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_427_Caption
rows.name:
The Larsians went out to fight some baddie 
that was running amok in Primordia, right? But
but they seem to have been beaten instead.
Their captain's brooding about it on our deck.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_428_Caption
rows.name:
The Zaruboggan worship a god named
Golbogga. I learned that from someone
named Feloran up on the Ma-non ship.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_429_Caption
rows.name:
The men of the Tree Clan were just running
around in a tizzy! It's some cultural thing,
but believe me, you do NOT want to see
something that big and strong in a tizzy.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_430_Caption
rows.name:
Sajif Scoppio was just here asking me 
about military tactics. It was surprising—
I'd never known a Bias to be so full of
intellectual curiosity before.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_431_Caption
rows.name:
So that Bias? Slovity? The scary one?
I don't know what she's planning to do up on
our ship, but I really really REALLY hope it's
nothing bad...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_432_Caption
rows.name:
Have you been following the election news?
According to Sun'barac, who's been
gathering data on the Ma-non ship, a
dangerous new candidate has emerged.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_434_Caption
rows.name:
I hope they clean up that wrecked Growth
Doll on top of the Arms test hangar soon.
It's creeping out my dates and torpedoing
my social life!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_438_Caption
rows.name:
I went to see Elma at the barracks, but she
was too lost in thought to say anything. Also,
I can't believe how good she looks when she's
thinking! Smart ladies are just the best.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_440_Caption
rows.name:
Defense Secretary Nagi is attending a party
with the Sakuraba big shots at noon today.
Shouldn't you go to the residential district to
provide security?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_443_Caption
rows.name:
At the Arms test hangar, a human named
Hugo claims to be making an invention that'll
reshape history. Do you think he'd let me help
with his research, maybe?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_451_Caption
rows.name:
This technical manual primarily covers
interfacing with objects of human make.
Grants level 2 access.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_452_Caption
rows.name:
This technical manual primarily covers
interfacing with objects of human make.
Grants level 3 access.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_453_Caption
rows.name:
This technical manual primarily covers
interfacing with objects of human make.
Grants level 4 access.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_454_Caption
rows.name:
A manual detailing advanced analysis
techniques. Grants further access to
treasure boxes of human make.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_455_Caption
rows.name:
This technical manual primarily covers
interfacing with natural objects.
Grants level 2 access.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_456_Caption
rows.name:
This technical manual primarily covers
interfacing with natural objects.
Grants level 3 access.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_457_Caption
rows.name:
This technical manual primarily covers
interfacing with natural objects.
Grants level 4 access.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_458_Caption
rows.name:
A manual detailing advanced analysis
techniques. Grants further access to
treasure boxes of an organic nature.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_459_Caption
rows.name:
This technical manual primarily covers
interfacing with objects of alien make.
Grants level 2 access.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_460_Caption
rows.name:
This technical manual primarily covers
interfacing with objects of alien make.
Grants level 3 access.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_461_Caption
rows.name:
This technical manual primarily covers
interfacing with objects of alien make.
Grants level 4 access.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_462_Caption
rows.name:
A manual detailing advanced analysis
techniques. Grants further access to
treasure boxes of alien make.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_463_Caption
rows.name:
They say gigantic purgovent smashing up
Oblivia's North Coast! Here's hoping friends
not run into it.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_464_Caption
rows.name:
There's a rocklike ovis near the Twin Arches
that attacks everything in sight. ...You know
what? Sometimes I really hate this planet.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_465_Caption
rows.name:
That signal we picked up from Oblivia's
South Coast? Yeah, that wasn't part of the
Lifepoint. It was just being transmitted from
some Doll wreckage.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_501_Caption
rows.name:
I've seen Phog hanging out by himself at the
lower strata beneath Deliverance Park in broad
daylight. It's awfully suspicious behavior, right?
Maybe we should report him to the Companions?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_502_Caption
rows.name:
That scientist Hugo looked so so thrilled while
he was tinkering with machines in the
Arms test hangar... Maybe that means
something exciting is about to happen?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_503_Caption
rows.name:
Did you know I met a human named Lin at
the construction site in the residential district?
Well, I did! And then she asked a million
questions about our ship...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_505_Caption
rows.name:
There's a storage area behind the sports
complex where Phog has been wandering
around and staring at the ground all day.
Guess he must have dropped something...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_506_Caption
rows.name:
There's a BLADE named Gwin who's always
training near the sports complex—even in the
dead of night. I certainly don't mind putting
my life in the hands of a man like that!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_507_Caption
rows.name:
I saw Fosdyke—one of the Celeste Three—at
Deliverance Park in the residential district.
Seriously! It was totally him!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_508_Caption
rows.name:
I saw L this morning at Deliverance Park.
He seems to be doing Bias dance of
courtship. Is it rutting season for L?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_509_Caption
rows.name:
I saw a cute xeno girl sunbathing in the park.
That's the sort of thing that makes me feel like
everything's right with the world.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_510_Caption
rows.name:
I see Doug working out at the sports complex
when he has time off. I don't see the point
since Blue Bloods don't atrophy, but he sure
is passionate about it.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_511_Caption
rows.name:
Gwin and Mathias were having a passionate
discussion about something at the water-
purification plant. Those two sure are close!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_512_Caption
rows.name:
I saw this human named Frye down by the
fountain in the residential district. He smelled
of alcohol and seemed to be fighting with a
cat? So so strange...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_514_Caption
rows.name:
Apparently Kirsty was looking for someone in
Cauldros, or found someone, or...something?
I can never understand what she's babbling
about when she gets excited.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_515_Caption
rows.name:
I just saw Gwin playing with a dog up in
Ishmael Hills. ...N-not that I care one way or
the other about him, of course! What are you
getting so jealous about?!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_516_Caption
rows.name:
I saw Miia standing in front of her Ishmael
Hills home looking troubled. And that is not
like her at ALL! She's about the spunkiest
person I know.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_517_Caption
rows.name:
If you ever need a hand, maybe talk to Hope?
She can help with pretty much anything.
I think she's out in the commercial district
right now, actually...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_518_Caption
rows.name:
Why has Phog been staring at the water-
purification plant with such a serious look on
his face? I don't get that guy at all.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_519_Caption
rows.name:
During lunch, I saw the Murderess talking to
a suspicious-looking guy at the house across
from Deliverance Park. Then I walked away,
because I don't want to end up in a ditch...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_520_Caption
rows.name:
Pets sure are incredible! I saw one cranky
lady in the residential district go from super
angry to totally calm, thanks to a pet.
I wonder if the little fella is still there?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_521_Caption
rows.name:
Miia not like Nopon after all—she only have
eye for stupid cat! Time to give her pieces of
mind next time she comes to commercial
district! Meh!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_522_Caption
rows.name:
I wonder what happens to the property of
fallen BLADE operatives? I'm sure Doug
would know, but I haven't seen him around
for a while.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_523_Caption
rows.name:
I saw a Nopon collapsed in the residential
district! Poor little guy looked sick or crazy
or something, so I just kept my distance.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_524_Caption
rows.name:
Holy wow. Did you see Elma at the
water-purification plant that night?!
No, I... I shouldn't say anything more.
I don't want her to get angry at me!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_525_Caption
rows.name:
Kirsty has been looking for that new member
of Elma's team near the water-purification
plant. She sure seemed to be excited about
something.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_526_Caption
rows.name:
Fritz was negotiating with this woman in
Armory Alley, right? Next thing I know,
she walked around the corner and suddenly
turned into a xeno! I saw it with my own eyes!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_527_Caption
rows.name:
I saw Miia in the alley behind the residential
district one night, and she was as perky as
ever. Seeing her like that always makes me
feel better.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_528_Caption
rows.name:
I heard an Orphean broke into Caroline's
house and trashed her yard. It's all anyone's
talking about in the residential district.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_529_Caption
rows.name:
Phog's been locked in a staring contest with a
cat in Ishmael Hills for I don't know how long.
What is up with that guy? He's the oddest
duck in this city, and that's saying something.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_530_Caption
rows.name:
Orphean named Kon'luarb in residential district
asks lots of questions about Biahno water-
purification plant. What is he planning?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_531_Caption
rows.name:
A lady named Rosie was screaming about
something over by the water-purification plant.
Poor thing must be at the end of her rope.
...Or crazy. Could be that, too.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_532_Caption
rows.name:
At sunset, I heard dogs barking at Irina
in front of a house near the cathedral.
That woman is just terrible with animals.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_533_Caption
rows.name:
I saw L staring at a cat over in the residential
district. He was mumbling to himself about
how one might go about eating such a
creature. So, uh, yeah. Lock up your cats.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_534_Caption
rows.name:
Earth-alien women are strange. Some even
buy big houses and live in them together.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_535_Caption
rows.name:
Wendy up in Ishmael Hills was complaining
that some Nopon salesman won't leave her
alone. Poor thing!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_536_Caption
rows.name:
I hear Secretary Nagi's paying a visit to Team
Elma's quarters at the BLADE barracks. Yep,
that group sure is close with the secretary...
MUST BE NICE!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_538_Caption
rows.name:
Even Dr. Staccata couldn't find a cure for this
disease. But apparently it will heal up if I visit
Fraisie in the cathedral?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_539_Caption
rows.name:
There's an extraordinarily odd Nopon in the
residential district who seems to be casting
some sort of spell. You don't think it's black
magic, do you? Or...blood magic? Eeeep!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_540_Caption
rows.name:
There's a woman over at the cathedral in the
residential district who's always preaching that
xenos and humans are equal. No thanks, pal!
Keep me far, far away from that wacko.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_541_Caption
rows.name:
I heard Letrick is out looking for a congregant
who visited the cathedral while he was out.
He's a diligent man, that one.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_542_Caption
rows.name:
There's a strange woman hanging out in the
residential-district park. And when I say
strange, I mean TOOOOTALLY WEIRD.
She might not even be from Earth.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_543_Caption
rows.name:
I saw Hope tending to flowers at the small
park by the cathedral during lunch. Knowing
her, it was probably a favor for someone else.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_544_Caption
rows.name:
Can we take containers in lower level
of residential district? They might make
nice chairs.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_545_Caption
rows.name:
Lately, traitors who deny the Ovah have
appeared in our midst. On'tonam in the
residential district is dealing with the situation.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_546_Caption
rows.name:
That Phoskeran guy has been hanging out in
Ishmael Hills, yelling to everyone about his
newfound obsession with fortune-telling.
...He is one weird Zaruboggan.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_547_Caption
rows.name:
Even the BLADE emergency supply caches are
sort of badass. See for yourself! There's one
right behind the cathedral in the residential
district.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_548_Caption
rows.name:
At the guard post in the lower area, I saw
Gwin spend his lunch hour talking to a
newbie friend and looking all grim. He didn't
even eat! I wonder what's going on...

rows.label: ITM_INFO_549_Caption
rows.name:
Lately, Irina has been spending her
mornings getting her weapons modified at
that BLADE gathering spot in the hangars.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_550_Caption
rows.name:
Those Ma-non sure are passionate about
learning! Quiquat has been asking all sorts
of questions about FrontierNET over near one
of the commercial district's storage areas.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_551_Caption
rows.name:
Who left that busted-up trailer just beyond
Armory Alley? Let's at least reclaim the stuff
inside that thing so it can be moved later!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_552_Caption
rows.name:
Hey, you know that Gus guy? I hear he's up
to some real shady business. You ask me,
BLADE would be better off without him
around.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_553_Caption
rows.name:
I heard there's a Ma-non repairman in the
lower level of the administrative district. He's 
supposed to be really talented, but he doesn't
seem to be enjoying his success much.

rows.label: ITM_INFO_554_Caption
rows.name:
I've been hearing Cedric grunting away in the
hangars at night. Has someone asked him
to create another ridiculous invention?

rows.label: ITM_INFO_555_Caption
rows.name:
I just met Kirsty, the big cheese for all of
FrontierNET! Sounds like she's aiming for
Oblivia next. I love that passion!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_556_Caption
rows.name:
That Kirsty woman is always giving my
husband dangerous assignments! She says she
doesn't have enough staff to survey Noctilum,
but who does she think she's kidding?!

rows.label: ITM_INFO_557_Caption
rows.name:
There's a BLADE aspirant at the storage area
behind Union Drive who can't get through
basic training. But she refuses to give up,
